original_text: But after the Lord has destroyed them, be careful! Do not do the same wrong things as they do. Do not try to worship their gods. Do not say, ‘How do the people of these nations worship their gods? I would like to do the same thing!’
korean_text: 너는 스스로 삼가 네 앞에서 멸망한 그들의 자취를 밟아 올무에 걸리지 말라 또 그들의 신을 탐구하여 이르기를 이 민족들은 그 신들을 어떻게 섬겼는고 나도 그와 같이 하겠다 하지 말라

sentences.original_text: But after the Lord has destroyed them
Do not do the same wrong things
Do not try to worship their gods
How do the people of these nations worship their gods?
sentences.korean_translation: 이 나라들 백성들이 어떻게 그들의 신들을 숭배하는가?

sentences.original_text: I would like to do the same thing!
